alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 3:23PM CST until February 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...In Arkansas, Columbia and Union Counties. In Texas, Cherokee County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
